name: Deep Below (itch)
description:
DEEP BELOW, is a game about combating water pollution by showing the ocean's most beautiful and horrific aspects. The player must control the submarine with the objective of relieving the ocean from as much pollution as it can, while ensuring that the submarine is maintained, and the generator is continuing to provide power to the cabin, allowing the player to fulfill its objective.

CREATED BY

DANIEL HINCKLEY

JAMIE TRANTER

SAM HARRIES

ALESSANDRA GARBER

SHANE TOYE
